id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this MCP3204 component.



*See also: [mcp3204 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mcp3204.html#configuration-variables)*

reference_voltage.docs:
**float**: The reference voltage. Defaults to `3.3V`.



*See also: [mcp3204 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mcp3204.html#configuration-variables)*

cs_pin.docs:
**[Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The SPI cable select pin to use.



*See also: [mcp3204 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mcp3204.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.



*See also: [mcp3204 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mcp3204.html#id1)*

mcp3204_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id of the parent MCP3204 component.



*See also: [mcp3204 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mcp3204.html#id1)*

number.docs:
**int**: The pin number of the MCP3204



*See also: [mcp3204 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mcp3204.html#id1)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.



*See also: [mcp3204 Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/mcp3204.html#id1)*
